about_the_game:
This is a very interesting VR leisure game. The theme of the game revolves around the dog race. Players can play the betting person in the game to sort the bets for the dogs who participated in the game.



Before the game starts, a group of lively and cute dogs will be eager to try on the field and prepare to start a fierce competition. At this time, you need to carefully watch the status of each dog, analyze their strength and performance, and then sort them to bet on them according to their judgments. If your prediction accuracy is high enough, you can get rich rewards.
There are also a variety of different perspective switching in the game, so that you can learn more about the game. Whether you like the gesture of the leader or the script that slowly counterattacks, you can easily achieve it in the game, and you can feel the tension and excitement of the game in the realm.
In short, this VR leisure game is not only interesting and fun, but also tests your prediction and analytical ability. If you have a special love for dogs, or if you like to challenge your prediction ability, don't miss this game!



Gameplay:
There are 6 dogs running in the game , and you choose a set of results to rank and bet for money

name: VR Dog Sprint

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE

short_description: This is a very interesting VR leisure game. The theme of the game revolves around the dog race. Players can play the betting person in the game to sort the bets for the dogs who participated in the game.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
